BatchDelete.name: BatchDelete
BatchDelete.description: Grants permission to delete channels, inputs, input security groups, and multiplexes.

BatchStart.name: BatchStart
BatchStart.description: Grants permission to start channels and multiplexes.

BatchStop.name: BatchStop
BatchStop.description: Grants permission to stop channels and multiplexes.

BatchUpdateSchedule.name: BatchUpdateSchedule
BatchUpdateSchedule.description: Grants permission to add and remove actions from a channel's schedule.

CreateChannel.name: CreateChannel
CreateChannel.description: Grants permission to create a channel

CreateInput.name: CreateInput
CreateInput.description: Grants permission to create an input

CreateInputSecurityGroup.name: CreateInputSecurityGroup
CreateInputSecurityGroup.description: Grants permission to create an input security group

CreateMultiplex.name: CreateMultiplex
CreateMultiplex.description: Grants permission to create a multiplex

CreateMultiplexProgram.name: CreateMultiplexProgram
CreateMultiplexProgram.description: Grants permission to create a multiplex program

CreateTags.name: CreateTags
CreateTags.description:
Grants permission to create tags for channels, inputs, input security groups, multiplexes,
                                                and reservations.

DeleteChannel.name: DeleteChannel
DeleteChannel.description: Grants permission to delete a channel

DeleteInput.name: DeleteInput
DeleteInput.description: Grants permission to delete an input

DeleteInputSecurityGroup.name: DeleteInputSecurityGroup
DeleteInputSecurityGroup.description: Grants permission to delete an input security group

DeleteMultiplex.name: DeleteMultiplex
DeleteMultiplex.description: Grants permission to delete a multiplex

DeleteMultiplexProgram.name: DeleteMultiplexProgram
DeleteMultiplexProgram.description: Grants permission to delete a multiplex program

DeleteReservation.name: DeleteReservation
DeleteReservation.description: Grants permission to delete an expired reservation

DeleteTags.name: DeleteTags
DeleteTags.description:
Grants permission to delete tags from channels, inputs, input security groups, multiplexes,
                                                and reservations.

DescribeChannel.name: DescribeChannel
DescribeChannel.description: Grants permission to get details about a channel

DescribeInput.name: DescribeInput
DescribeInput.description: Grants permission to describe an input

DescribeInputDevice.name: DescribeInputDevice
DescribeInputDevice.description: Grants permission to describe an input device

DescribeInputDeviceThumbnail.description: Grants permission to describe an input device thumbnail

DescribeInputSecurityGroup.description: Grants permission to describe an input security group

DescribeMultiplex.name: DescribeMultiplex
DescribeMultiplex.description: Grants permission to describe a multiplex

DescribeMultiplexProgram.name: DescribeMultiplexProgram
DescribeMultiplexProgram.description: Grants permission to describe a multiplex program

DescribeOffering.name: DescribeOffering
DescribeOffering.description: Grants permission to get details about a reservation offering

DescribeReservation.name: DescribeReservation
DescribeReservation.description: Grants permission to get details about a reservation

DescribeSchedule.name: DescribeSchedule
DescribeSchedule.description: Grants permission to view a list of actions scheduled on a channel.

ListInputDevices.description: Grants permission to list input devices

ListInputSecurityGroups.description: Grants permission to list input security groups

ListMultiplexPrograms.name: ListMultiplexPrograms
ListMultiplexPrograms.description: Grants permission to list multiplex programs

ListOfferings.name: ListOfferings
ListOfferings.description: Grants permission to list reservation offerings

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description:
Grants permission to list tags for channels, inputs, input security groups, multiplexes,
                                                and reservations.

PurchaseOffering.name: PurchaseOffering
PurchaseOffering.description: Grants permission to purchase a reservation offering

StartChannel.name: StartChannel
StartChannel.description: Grants permission to start a channel

StartMultiplex.description: Grants permission to start a multiplex

StopChannel.description: Grants permission to stop a channel
